Title: It's a Matt, Matt, Matt, Matt World
Writer: Tom Perrotta (based on the book by), Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Lila Byock, Damon Lindelof
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Chris Zylka
Plot: Convinced it is Kevin's destiny to be in Miracle for the coming seventh anniversary of the Departure, Matt Jamison impulsively heads to Australia in an effort to bring Kevin home.
